ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM 900/1800/1900 cell phone with International 3G compatibility (2100 UMTS) and GPRS data capabilities
Svelte, stylish Walkman phone with advanced digital audio player, FM radio and 8 GB internal memory
Business-oriented with Symbian OS, document editing; Wi-Fi connectivity; 3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music streaming
Up to 9 hours of talk time, up to 370 hours (15+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson W960i 8 GB Unlocked Cell Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, 3G, Wi-Fi, MP3/Video Player--International Version with No Warranty (Vinyl Black)
